meanings.sent1: There are quattuordecillions of stars in the universe.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the distance in quattuordecillions of meters.
meanings.sent3: I have quattuordecillions of chores to do before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as quattuordecillions.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with quattuordecillions of gold coins.

meanings.sent1: The bakery produced quattuordecillions of cookies for the event.
meanings.sent2: She had quattuordecillions of reasons to be grateful.
meanings.sent3: The toddler made quattuordecillions of bubbles in the bath.
meanings.sent4: The forest was home to quattuordecillions of chirping birds.
meanings.sent5: The library contained quattuordecillions of books on various topics.
